001package com.github.sormuras.bach.workflow;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.Bach;
004import com.github.sormuras.bach.Command;
005import com.github.sormuras.bach.Project;
006import com.github.sormuras.bach.ToolCall;
007import com.github.sormuras.bach.ToolFinder;
008import com.github.sormuras.bach.ToolRun;
009import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.ModuleFinderSupport;
010import com.github.sormuras.bach.project.ProjectSpace;
011import java.lang.module.ModuleFinder;
012import java.nio.file.Path;
013import java.util.ArrayList;
014
015public class RunAllTestsWorkflow extends AbstractSpaceWorkflow {
016
017  public RunAllTestsWorkflow(Bach bach, Project project, ProjectSpace space) {
018    super(bach, project, space);
019  }
020
021  protected ModuleFinder computeRuntimeModuleFinder() {
022    var paths = new ArrayList<Path>();
023    paths.add(computeOutputDirectoryForModules(space));
024    paths.addAll(computeModulePathsOption().values());
025    return ModuleFinder.of(paths.toArray(Path[]::new));
026  }
027
028  @Override
029  public void run() {
030    bach.logCaption("Run all tests in %s space".formatted(space.name()));
031    var moduleFinder = computeRuntimeModuleFinder();
032    for (var module : space.modules()) {
033      var name = module.name();
034      if (ModuleFinderSupport.findMainClass(moduleFinder, name).isPresent()) {
035        new RunModuleWorkflow(bach, project, space, Command.of(name)).run();
036      }
037      var toolFinder = ToolFinder.of(moduleFinder, true, name);
038      runTool(toolFinder, "test", bach.printer()::print);
039      if (toolFinder.find("junit").isPresent()) {
040        runJUnit(toolFinder, name);
041      }
042    }
043  }
044
045  private void runTool(ToolFinder finder, String tool, ToolRun.Visitor visitor) {
046    for (var provider : finder.list(tool)) {
047      var singleton = ToolFinder.of(provider);
048      var call = ToolCall.of(singleton, Command.of(tool));
049      var run = bach.run(call);
050      visitor.accept(run);
051    }
052  }
053
054  private void runJUnit(ToolFinder finder, String module) {
055    runJUnit(finder, module, ToolRun.Visitor.noop());
056  }
057
058  private void runJUnit(ToolFinder finder, String module, ToolRun.Visitor visitor) {
059    var reports = computeOutputDirectoryForReports().resolve("junit").resolve(module);
060    var junit = Command.junit().add("--select-module", module).add("--reports-dir", reports);
061    var call = ToolCall.of(finder, junit);
062    var run = bach.run(call);
063    visitor.accept(run);
064  }
065}
